column3: of little rock passed away friday
column6: 1983 in little rock to pamela fendley and stephen tedder. he is preceded in death by his grandparents
column9: col irby tedder and rachael tedder. he is survived by his parents
column29: had a great sense of humor and always had a smile on his face. he loved music learning to play drums at an early age and later the guitar. a night never went by that he didnt tell his mother i love you before she went to bed. he was very loved and will be greatly missed. the family would like thank allison fausett summers
column31: sam joiner and bo emmet for their longtime friendship
column32: love and support they provided austin. a visitation will be held at ruebel funeral home on wednesday
